translation.homepage welcome: fun and playful Blob Emoji for Discord

license.1: All blobs that are uploaded to official Blob Emoji servers are licensed under the <1>Apache License 2.0</1>, the same license that <3>Noto Emoji</3> by Google are licensed under.
license.2: All blobs from the official servers can be downloaded <1>here</1>. Make sure to follow the license.

note.1: To add your Blob Server to our Community Servers section, join the official <1>Blob Emoji server</1> and message our Blob Mail bot.
note.2: In order to use custom emoji in other Discord Servers you need an active <1/><2>Discord Nitro</2> subscription.

changepage.title: Global Blob Changelog
changepage.description: This page tracks the changes of all blobs in any of our partnered servers.
